affiliations.title: Indian Institute of Metals(IIM)
affiliations.content: As a Student Member in IIM Jamshedpur Chapter, responsible for organising national and international technical conferences and programmes and extending active participation in research activities and publications.

affiliations.title: Team RoadRunner, SAE International
affiliations.content: As the Drivetrain engineer, designed and optimised the performance of sprocket and chain assembly. As the manufacturing head, fabricated composite body of the race car.
